sentence.text: Likewise, HCV replication is severely impaired within hepatocellular carcinoma (phosphatidylinositol phosphorylation) tissue in vivo, but the mechanisms responsible for this restriction are presently unknown.

Here, we identify tumor-associated calcium signal transducer 2 (negative regulation of epithelial cell migration), one of the most downregulated genes in primary phosphatidylinositol phosphorylation tissue, as a host factor that interacts with cell-cell junction organization and cell-cell junction organization and regulates their cellular localization.

entity.text: negative regulation of epithelial cell migration
